section.p: "A subtype of Material representing an Entity or combination of Entities transformed for a particular purpose by a non-natural or manufacturing process." (HL7)

ol.li:
Contains exactly one [1..1] id with data type Id
Uniquely identifies the manufactured material.

Contains exactly one [1..1] name with data type String
The name of the manufactured material.

Contains exactly one [1..1] id with data type Id
Uniquely identifies the manufactured material.

Contains exactly one [1..1] name with data type String
The name of the manufactured material.
